guidelines:
Turk's Island Salt Mix
Chemical g/2 L Final Conc. Mfc.-PN Chemical Grade
 NaCl  56.22 481 mM   Fisher S271 ACS 
MgSO4·7H2O  13.8  28 mM  Sigma M2773  Mo.Biol. 99% 
MgCl2·6H2O  10.98  27 mM  AlfaAesar  99.99% 
CaCl2·2H2O  2.94  10 mM  Fisher C79  ACS 
KCl  1.34  9 mM  Acros  99+% 
MQ·H2O  QS to 2000 ml  na  in house  na 


Macronutrients 
Macronutrient  g/100 ml  Final Conc. Mfc.-PN  Chemical Grade 
0.1 M NaH2PO4·H2O 1.38  50 µM  Mallinckrodt 7892-04  ACS 
0.8 M (NH4)2SO4  10.57  400 µM  VWR-BDH 0216  ACS 99% 

Buffers
Buffer Stock Final Conc. Mfc.-PN Chemical Grade
0.6 M NaHCO3 0.504 g/10 ml  6 mM  Sigma S6014 ACS 99.7-100.3% 
1 M HEPES  11.9 g/50 ml  1 mM  Fisher BP310  Mol. Biol.  

Trace Metal Mix Working Stock
Trace Metal Primary Stock Final Conc. Mfc.-PN Chemical Grade
Na2EDTA·2H2O  0.2175 g/50 ml 0.1170 µM  Sigma E4884  ACS 99-101%
FeCl3·6H2O 0.16 g/50 ml  0.1180 µM  Sigma 44944 ACS 98-102% 
ZnSO4·7H2O  1.15 g/50 ml  0.0008 µM  Sigma 204986  >99.5% 
CoCl2·6H2O  0.595 g/50 ml  0.0005 µM  Sigma 60820  >98% 
MnCl2·4H2O  8.905 g/50 ml  0.0090 µM  M3634  ReagentPlus >99% 
Na2MoO4·2H2O  0.363 g/50 ml  0.0003 µM  M1651  >99.5% 
Na2SeO3  0.865 g/50 ml  0.0010 µM  S5261  BioReagent ~98% 
NiCl2·6H2O  1.19 g/50 ml  0.0010 µM  223387  ReagentPlus 
Note: Use primary stocks of ZnSO4, CoCl2, MnCl2, Na2MoO4, Na2SeO3, and NiCl2 prepared for Pro99 trace metal working stock.

components.data: Dissolve each salt completely before adding the next one
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dissolve each salt completely before adding the next one

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 1 of Artificial Seawater Based AMP1 Medium
source_data.annotation: Refer to table in guidelines for full list of salts.
source_data.thread_text: Refer to table in guidelines for full list of salts.
source_data.body: Refer to table in guidelines for full list of salts.

components.data: Dispense into 500 ml acid-washed polycarbonate bottles
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dispense into 500 ml acid-washed polycarbonate bottles
Autoclave 30 min.
pH NaH<sub>2</sub>PO<sub>4</sub> to 7.5 using 1M NaOH

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 4 of Artificial Seawater Based AMP1 Medium
Annotation on step 4 of Artificial Seawater Based AMP1 Medium

components.data: Filter sterilize each solution using 0.2 µm syringe filter into new, sterile 50ml centrifuge tubes or acid washed and sterile polycarbonate bottles
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter sterilize each solution using 0.2 µm syringe filter into new, sterile 50ml centrifuge tubes or acid washed and sterile polycarbonate bottles
Store at 4°C

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 6 of Artificial Seawater Based AMP1 Medium
source_data.annotation: Dispense 250 µl of each per 500 ml bottle of Turk's Island Salt Mix when preparing final medium.
source_data.thread_text: Dispense 250 µl of each per 500 ml bottle of Turk's Island Salt Mix when preparing final medium.
source_data.body: Dispense 250 µl of each per 500 ml bottle of Turk's Island Salt Mix when preparing final medium.

source_data.description: pH HEPES to 7.5 using 1M NaOH

Annotation on step 7 of Artificial Seawater Based AMP1 Medium

components.data: Filter sterilize each solution using 0.2 µm syringe filter into new, sterile 15 or 50 ml centrifuge tubes or acid washed and sterile polycarbonate bottles
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter sterilize each solution using 0.2 µm syringe filter into new, sterile 15 or 50 ml centrifuge tubes or acid washed and sterile polycarbonate bottles
Store at 4°C

components.data: Dispense 5 ml of NaHCO<sub>3</sub> and 0.5 ml HEPES per 500 ml bottle of Turk's Island Salt Mix when preparing final medium
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dispense 5 ml of NaHCO<sub>3</sub> and 0.5 ml HEPES per 500 ml bottle of Turk's Island Salt Mix when preparing final medium

components.data: Weigh out 0.2175 g Na<sub>2</sub>EDTA·2H<sub>2</sub>O using dust free paper
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Weigh out 0.2175 g Na<sub>2</sub>EDTA·2H<sub>2</sub>O using dust free paper

components.data: Transfer to acid washed 50 ml volumetric flask filled with 40 ml MQ-water
components.name: Description

components.data: Dissolve EDTA by inverting flask several times
components.name: Description

source_data.annotation: May have to heat 5 min. at 80°C to dissolve.

components.name: Description

source_data.description: Weigh out 0.16 g FeCl<sub>3</sub>·6H<sub>2</sub>O using dust free paper

components.data: Dissolve iron chloride into same volumetric flask by inverting several times
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dissolve iron chloride into same volumetric flask by inverting several times

components.data: Individually add and dissolve 50 µl each of the ZnSO<sub>4</sub>, CoCl<sub>2</sub>, MnCl<sub>2</sub>, Na<sub>2</sub>MoO<sub>4</sub>, NaSeO<sub>3</sub>, and NiCl<sub>2</sub> Primary Trace Metal Stocks

components.name: Description

components.data: Filter through a 0.2 µm syringe filter into sterile, acid washed container in laminar flow hood
components.name: Description

Store sterile stock at 4°C

components.data: Dispense 5 µl Stock Trace Metal Mix to 500 ml bottle of Turk's Island Salt Mix when preparing final medium
components.name: Description
